mapper.select: SELECT A.CLC_WRK_NO ,A.BILL_YYMM ,A.BILL_CYCL ,B.BILL_CYCL ,A.USE_YYMM ,A.SVC_CMPS_ID ,A.RATE_ITM_CD ,A.SO_ID ,A.GRP_ID ,A.PYM_ACNT_ID ,A.CUST_ID ,A.CTRT_ID ,A.PROD_CMPS_ID ,A.USE_AMT - CASE WHEN B.USE_AMT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE B.USE_AMT END AS USE_AMT ,A.USE_QTY_UT + CASE WHEN B.USE_QTY_UT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE B.USE_QTY_UT END AS USE_QTY_UT ,A.USE_QTY + CASE WHEN B.USE_QTY IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE B.USE_QTY END AS USE_QTY ,A.USE_CNT - CASE WHEN B.USE_CNT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE B.USE_CNT END AS USE_CNT ,A.CRNCY_CD from ( SELECT CLC_WRK_NO, BILL_YYMM, BILL_CYCL, USE_YYMM, SVC_CMPS_ID, RATE_ITM_CD, SO_ID, GRP_ID, PYM_ACNT_ID, CUST_ID, CTRT_ID, PROD_CMPS_ID , SUM(USE_AMT) AS USE_AMT, SUM(USE_QTY_UT) AS USE_QTY_UT, SUM(USE_QTY) AS USE_QTY, SUM(USE_CNT) AS USE_CNT, CRNCY_CD, SUM(VAT) AS VAT FROM TBLCH_CHRG_TEMP_RV WHERE 1=1 AND SO_ID = #{soId} AND P_SEQ = #{pSeq} AND CLC_WRK_NO = #{clcWrkNo} AND USE_YYMM = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(str_to_date(#{billYymm},'%Y%m'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y%m') GROUP BY CLC_WRK_NO, BILL_YYMM, BILL_CYCL, USE_YYMM, SVC_CMPS_ID, RATE_ITM_CD, SO_ID, GRP_ID, PYM_ACNT_ID, CUST_ID, CTRT_ID, PROD_CMPS_ID, CRNCY_CD ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CLC_WRK_NO, BILL_YYMM, BILL_CYCL, USE_YYMM, SVC_CMPS_ID, RATE_ITM_CD, SO_ID, GRP_ID, PYM_ACNT_ID, CUST_ID, CTRT_ID, PROD_CMPS_ID , SUM(USE_AMT) AS USE_AMT, SUM(USE_QTY_UT) AS USE_QTY_UT, SUM(USE_QTY) AS USE_QTY, SUM(USE_CNT) AS USE_CNT, CRNCY_CD, SUM(VAT) AS VAT FROM TBLCH_CHRG WHERE 1=1 AND SO_ID = #{soId} AND BILL_YYMM = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(str_to_date(#{billYymm},'%Y%m'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y%m') AND USE_YYMM = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(str_to_date(#{billYymm},'%Y%m'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y%m') GROUP BY CLC_WRK_NO, BILL_YYMM, BILL_CYCL, USE_YYMM, SVC_CMPS_ID, RATE_ITM_CD, SO_ID, GRP_ID, PYM_ACNT_ID, CUST_ID, CTRT_ID, PROD_CMPS_ID, CRNCY_CD ) B ON A.CTRT_ID = B.CTRT_ID AND A.USE_YYMM = B.USE_YYMM AND A.SVC_CMPS_ID = B.SVC_CMPS_ID AND A.RATE_ITM_CD = B.RATE_ITM_CD AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID = B.PYM_ACNT_ID
